sentences.sContent: This process of changing us to be more like Jesus is called sanctification.
sentences.sContent_eng: This process of changing us to be more like Jesus is called sanctification.
sentences.sCn: 这个转换我们，使我们更像耶稣的过程就叫做神圣化。

sentences.sContent: So although holiness derives from god, humans have a crucial role to play in sanctification, in sanctifying the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: So although holiness derives from god, humans have a crucial role to play in sanctification, in sanctifying the world.
sentences.sCn: 尽管神圣源于神灵，人类在将世界神圣化的过程中，扮演者重要的角色。

words.tran: 认可的，批准的；神圣化的
圣洁；尊严；神圣不可侵犯性
假装的圣人气派；假装的虔诚，假装的神圣
使圣洁；使神圣化；把…奉献给神；认可
